objects.text:
• Classic Vintage Design
• X-Trans CMOS Sensor
• Advanced Autofocus System
• Premium Metal Construction

Built-in electronic viewfinder
Wi-Fi connectivity
Full HD video recording

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Professional Mirrorless Camera - Premium Photography, Compact Design
product_details.description:
• Classic vintage-inspired design with modern functionality
• High-performance X-Trans CMOS sensor for exceptional image quality
• Advanced autofocus system with multiple focus points
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Versatile tilting LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Built-in electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Compact and lightweight body ideal for travel photography
• Film simulation modes for creative photo styles
• Wi-Fi connectivity for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Full HD video recording capabilities
• Fast continuous shooting for action photography
• Weather-sealed body for outdoor shooting confidence

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, professional layout promoting a high-end digital camera. The design is split into quadrants using a structured grid background, enhancing its tech-forward look. At the top-left, a bold heading (`heading`) paired with a sleek subheading (`subheading`) captures attention. The product image (`product_image`) dominates the top right quadrant, immersing viewers visually. Below the text blocks are a feature list (`features`) and a description (`description`) on opposite sides, enhancing readability. A bright price tag (`price`) and prominent call-to-action button (`cta` with `cta_button`) anchor the lower-left space. The tagline (`tagline`) reinforces product strengths in the bottom-right.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#1A1A1A`
- Charcoal Gray: `#252525`
- Steel Gray: `#444444`
- Off-White: `#E0E0E0`
- Bright Orange: `#FF4500`
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF`
- Medium Gray: `#B0B0B0`
product_color: The product image highlights a Fujifilm X-T10 camera with a sleek, modern aesthetic. The dominant color is matte black (#1C1C1C), giving it a professional and premium feel. Accents in metallic gunmetal gray (#3D3D3D) and silver (#C0C0C0) are used on the dials and rings, adding contrast and a refined look. White (#FFFFFF) text stands out for branding and technical markings, ensuring readability. Subtle highlights of red (#FF3B30) and orange (#FFA500) on the lens and dial draw attention to functionality. The color palette blends harmoniously, balancing utility with style — ideal for an advertisement banner focusing on elegance and performance.
